services.offerText: Off-the-Beaten-Track Telegram Solutions for your business. We design, build and lead unique, powerful apps to grow your business inside Telegram.
services.why1: • Allows you to retain users active on Telegram
services.why2: • Creating TMA is cheaper than mobile development
services.why4: • Ease of use increases sales and brand awareness
services.tma: TMA: grow your business inside Telegram
services.tmaText: Turn Telegram into a powerful traffic tool with TMA without complex mobile development. We'll help you create a cool app tailored to your business needs.
services.WhyMiniAppsText: TMAs are integrated into Telegram, one of the fastest growing ecosystems in the world with over 900 million active users. The impressive reach allows you to interact with a huge audience without the need to download anything extra for the user.
services.WhyMiniAppsText2: TMAs offer fast and easy onboarding, embedded payments, and high engagement, making them an ideal format for gaming, e-commerce, fintech, and platform communities.
services.OurExpertiseText: We have commercial experience designing and building applications on Telegram, understanding the platform's capabilities and selecting the best solutions. Our portfolio includes user-centric products with a focus on retention and engagement. By choosing us, you will get a functioning secure product with optimized performance and scalable architecture. This approach allows companies to utilize the full potential of Telegram to achieve their goals.

projects.GWTMA: Developed a Play-to-Earn game as a TMA: players mine in-game currency, fight each other, customize characters. The combination of memorable design and popular mechanics allowed the game to compete with the Game- Fi market leaders.
projects.botdesc:
Developed a Telegram bot that allows users to make exchange transactions between various cryptoassets.
The application is integrated into the Telegram ecosystem and offers a user-friendly interface for fast and secure transactions.

contacts.name: name
contacts.contactText: Do you have an idea? Do you need a development team to implement it? Whether it's about a new product, an original design or just technical advice, we are ready to help!
contacts.contactTextBold: Drop us a message, and let’s make things happen.

about.about1: A team of tech geeks who live to turn even the wildest ideas into working systems and real products. We love everything that can be digitalized, understand how to deliver value and make any user happy.
about.LEGENDARY: GOT A GAME-CHANGING CONCEPT? LETS MAKE IT LEGENDARY!
